Mission: Growing total number of Alumni is our purpose and #1 goal.
DSU donation app makes it easy to give.
We use our mobile devices (smartphone, tablet, Chromebook, etc.) to pay bills, keep in touch with family and friends, stay informed about what's happening at home and abroad. Our phone helps make life easier giving us access to a multitude of daily coveniences. Why not give? The rate of DSU alumnae annual donation is about 10% which means 1 out of 10 graduates donate annually. Your gift will have a direct impact on increasing our rate of giving and growing our ranks.
